text: A plasmid control was generated to determine the error rate of the PCR and sequencing steps as described previously [ 17 ] . PCR products were prepared for sequencing using the QIAquick PCR Purification kit ( Qiagen , Valencia , CA ) . Sequencing of an aliquot of a subset of 40 samples was carried out by Eureka Genomics , Hercules , CA using an Illumina Genome Analyzer IIx . Another aliquot of the same samples plus an additional 4 samples were set for 454 sequencing at the Brigham Young University DNA
